name: Block Hit - Puzzle Game
description:
Block Hit Puzzle is a fun tile-matching puzzle game that won’t let your brain get bored!

The goal of Block Hit Puzzle is complete each level by filling the game field. Drag the colorful block of various shapes to fill up all free space. Blocks can't be rotated.

The game has 16 stages – Novice, Skilled, Master, Expert and others. There are endless variations of block shapes and game field shapes.

If you get stuck you can use hints that will show you the possible block placements.

So, be smart, try hard and complete lots of tricky levels.

Features:
Easy & free to play
Colorful blocks
No time limits
Simple rules
Greatly addictive

Block Hit Puzzle game is a real time killer. Play this puzzle game – it will make your smarter!
